name: Panda in Space
description:
Gameplay Features

In Panda in Space, you can do pretty much anything a normal panda can do. For example, you can:

- use an epic grappling hook to zip around levels

- travel through space and time to fulfill your destiny

- play through 9 rage inducing levels

- eat bamboo

Screenshots Mechanics/Inspiration

The theme of the Beginner's Circle Jam #3 was A Different Planet. Different planets have different gravity, right? So I decided to make the gravity change depending on the level, as well as implementing mechanics that I thought would be fun with low gravity. These include:

- grappling hook

- bounce pads

- double jumping

That's all for now! Have fun and don't forget to tell me what you think about it! I love you all so much!!!★~(◠△⊙✿)
